notes.text: Finally got KOG with DM after grinding with REZ, Venus and budget CA. My toughest matchup all season long was floodgate traphole. Mostly played against GB and Burn. I found that this deck has a good matchup against every deck and can recover from floodgate with legion. When I finally got my second ancient rules to complete the deck it became much more consistent and then I was able to shoot up the ladder. Btw this is my first post since joining discord
